title: Gearty Grilling: Charlie Bean on how the Bank of England dealt with the economic crisis
itunes:author: Charlie Bean
description: Contributor(s): Charlie Bean | Charlie Bean, Professor of Economics and former Deputy Governor for Monetary Policy at the Bank of England, discusses how the Bank of England dealt with the economic crisis.
itunes:summary: Contributor(s): Charlie Bean | Charlie Bean, Professor of Economics and former Deputy Governor for Monetary Policy at the Bank of England, discusses how the Bank of England dealt with the economic crisis.
